title: Is the vehicle stable?
alert_title: Danger. Please secure the vehicle before continuing

title: Is the operators manual in the vehicle?
Are you authorised in the use of this vehicle?
alert_title: Danger. Do not inspect any vehicle unless you are authorised

title: Is the first aid kit present and fully stocked?
Date of next inspection- fire extinguisher
Is the vehicle clean and all items secure?
Are the safety tools present? (Jack, Wheel brace, glass breaker)
Are the following items operating as designed?
Is the vehicle free of damage?
Are all safety guards in place?
Are the tyres correctly inflated with good tread and wheel nuts tight?
Are you authorised to inflate or change tyres?
alert_title: Do not work on tyres unless authorised

title: Is the windscreen and mirrors clean and free of damage?
Are the fan and drive belts in good working order?
Has the daily greasing been carried out?
Do the foot and hand brakes work properly?
Is the trailer stable?
alert_title: Please secure the vehicle before continuing

title: Is the trailer free of damage?
Are the tyres correctly inflated, in good working order with wheel nuts tightened?
Is the tow hitch free of damage and greased if necessary?
Are all lights and indicators functioning?
Are electrical cables or hydraulic hoses free of damage?
Are you authorised to inflate/change tyres?
alert_title: Do not work on tyres unless authorised

title: Is the motor housed correctly and free of damage?
Are all guards fuel levels acceptable?
Are all hoses fitted correctly and free from leaks? (Pump motors)
Test the Residual Current Device. Does it function as designed? (Electrical generators)
